title: Inscribed Panel
description:
Limestone fragment of tomb wall inscription. Part of one column at the right and two full lines of inscription are extant. The text identifies the tomb owner as one W3h,ib.R’.
Condition: The face of the piece is in good condition with well-cut and somewhat detailed signs. There are traces of the bottoms of the two signs above the first extant line.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
